name: angular-img-fallback
description: Utility to work with loading images, has fallback-src to handle errors in image loading and loading-src for images loading placeholders.

scripts.build: babel angular.dcb-img-fallback.js -o angular.dcb-img-fallback.min.js -s --no-comments && uglifyjs angular.dcb-img-fallback.min.js -c -m -o angular.dcb-img-fallback.min.js

author: Daniel Cohen <dcohenb@gmail.com>
